## fromInterval variable

Returns a new [Stream](./rstream.stream.md) which emits a monotonically increasing counter value at given `delay` interval, up to an optionally defined max value (default: âˆž), after which the stream is closed. The stream only starts when the first subscriber becomes available.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
fromInterval: (delay: number, count?: number) => Stream<number>
```
